text: Aur jab inn ko koi aayat phonchti hai to yun kehtay hain kay hum hergiz eman na layen gay jab tak kay hum ko bhi aisi hi cheez na di jaye jo Allah kay rasoolon ko di jati hai iss moqay ko to Allah hi khoob janta hai kay kahan woh apni payghumbari rakhay? Un-qarib inn logon ko jinhon ney jurm kiya hai Allah kay pass phonch ker zillat phonchay gi aur inn ki shararaton kay muqablay mein sazay-e-sakht
